tiles.name: old_delhi_north
tiles.description: The northern section of Old Delhi, a labyrinth of narrow streets and crowded bazaars, known for its street food and historical monuments.

tiles.name: jama_masjid_district
tiles.description: Centered around the Jama Masjid mosque, a bustling area with Islamic architecture, kebab stalls, and a vibrant cultural atmosphere.

tiles.name: red_fort_vicinity
tiles.description: The area surrounding the Red Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, filled with historical significance and tourist attractions.

tiles.name: chandni_chowk_central
tiles.description: The heart of Chandni Chowk, overflowing with spice markets, textiles, and a symphony of sights, sounds, and smells. Shreyansh's home and livelihood.

tiles.name: khari_baoli_spice_market
tiles.description: Asia's largest spice market, a sensory overload of exotic aromas and vibrant colors, where Shreyansh's family shop thrives.

tiles.name: daryaganj_book_market
tiles.description: A Sunday book market stretching along Daryaganj road, offering a wide selection of new and used books.

tiles.name: new_delhi_railway_station_area
tiles.description: The chaotic area around New Delhi Railway Station, a major transportation hub connecting Delhi to the rest of India.

tiles.name: paharganj_backpacker_district
tiles.description: A popular backpacker district near the railway station, known for its budget hotels, restaurants, and lively atmosphere.

tiles.name: kashmere_gate_isbt
tiles.description: Kashmere Gate Inter-State Bus Terminal, a major bus station connecting Delhi to neighboring states.

tiles.name: civil_lines_residential_area
tiles.description: A relatively quieter residential area north of Old Delhi, characterized by colonial-era bungalows and tree-lined streets.

tiles.name: tis_hazari_courts_complex
tiles.description: The location of the Tis Hazari Courts, one of the major district courts in Delhi.

tiles.name: ajmeri_gate_area
tiles.description: The area surrounding Ajmeri Gate, a historical gate and bustling commercial zone.

tiles.name: connaught_place_outer_circle
tiles.description: The outer circle of Connaught Place, a major commercial and financial hub of Delhi, known for its colonial architecture.

tiles.name: gole_market_area
tiles.description: A market area known for its food stalls and street vendors, offering a variety of local delicacies.

tiles.name: karol_bagh_shopping_district
tiles.description: A popular shopping district known for its textiles, clothing, and electronic goods.

tiles.name: rajinder_nagar_residential
tiles.description: A densely populated residential area close to Karol Bagh, mostly housing middle-class families.

tiles.name: delhi_university_north_campus
tiles.description: The North Campus of Delhi University, a hub of academic activity and student life.

tiles.name: model_town_residential
tiles.description: A planned residential area with relatively wide streets and green spaces.

tiles.name: wazirabad_industrial_area
tiles.description: An industrial area located in North Delhi, with factories and manufacturing units.

tiles.name: yamuna_river_northern_stretch
tiles.description: The northern stretch of the Yamuna River flowing through Delhi, often polluted but still vital for the region.

tiles.name: old_delhi_south
tiles.description: The southern part of Old Delhi, characterized by its historical buildings and traditional markets.

tiles.name: delhi_gate_area
tiles.description: An area marked by the historical Delhi Gate, connecting Old Delhi to New Delhi.

tiles.name: feroz_shah_kotla_fort_ruins
tiles.description: The ruins of Feroz Shah Kotla Fort, a historical site with ancient structures and legends.

tiles.name: raj_ghat_memorial
tiles.description: The memorial to Mahatma Gandhi, a serene and reflective space.

tiles.name: sri_digambar_jain_lal_mandir
tiles.description: The oldest Jain temple in Delhi, located opposite the Red Fort, known for its charity bird hospital.

tiles.name: netaji_subhash_marg
tiles.description: A major arterial road connecting the Red Fort to Daryaganj and beyond.

tiles.name: delhi_stock_exchange_area
tiles.description: The location of the Delhi Stock Exchange, representing the financial activities of the region.

tiles.name: parliament_street_area
tiles.description: The area around Parliament Street in New Delhi, with government buildings and historical architecture.

tiles.name: india_gate_vicinity
tiles.description: The area surrounding India Gate, a war memorial and popular gathering place.

tiles.name: national_museum_area
tiles.description: The location of the National Museum, housing a vast collection of Indian art and artifacts.

tiles.name: turkman_gate_area
tiles.description: An older part of Delhi, known for its historical significance and congested lanes.

tiles.name: ramlila_ground
tiles.description: A large open ground used for festivals and public gatherings, notably the Ramlila performance.

tiles.name: shanti_vana_memorial_park
tiles.description: A memorial park dedicated to Jawaharlal Nehru, India's first Prime Minister.

tiles.name: supreme_court_area
tiles.description: The location of the Supreme Court of India, the highest judicial body in the country.

tiles.name: presidential_palace_area
tiles.description: The area around the Rashtrapati Bhavan, the official residence of the President of India.

tiles.name: janpath_market
tiles.description: A street market known for its handicrafts, clothing, and souvenirs.

tiles.name: lodhi_garden
tiles.description: A historical garden with tombs and monuments from the Lodhi dynasty.

tiles.name: khan_market
tiles.description: An upscale market known for its boutiques, restaurants, and cafes.

tiles.name: sunder_nursery_heritage_park
tiles.description: A restored heritage park with Mughal-era monuments and gardens.

tiles.name: nizamuddin_dargah
tiles.description: The shrine of Sufi saint Nizamuddin Auliya, a place of pilgrimage and spiritual significance.

tiles.name: ddu_marg_institutional_area
tiles.description: An area with various government and institutional buildings along Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Marg.

tiles.name: minto_road_government_housing
tiles.description: An area with government housing complexes and administrative offices.

tiles.name: africa_avenue_diplomatic_area
tiles.description: An area with embassies and diplomatic missions from various African countries.

tiles.name: south_extension_market
tiles.description: A popular market known for its clothing, jewelry, and restaurants.

tiles.name: INA_market
tiles.description: A market known for its international food products and seafood.

tiles.name: hauz_khas_village
tiles.description: An urban village with historical ruins, cafes, and boutiques.

tiles.name: green_park_residential_area
tiles.description: An upscale residential area with parks and green spaces.

tiles.name: aiims_hospital_complex
tiles.description: The location of the All India Institute of Medical Sciences, a major hospital and research institution.

tiles.name: safdarjung_tomb_area
tiles.description: The area surrounding Safdarjung's Tomb, a late Mughal-era mausoleum.

tiles.name: ambedkar_nagar_slum_area
tiles.description: A densely populated slum area reflecting the socio-economic disparities of the city.

tiles.name: yamuna_vihar_residential
tiles.description: A residential area across the Yamuna River, characterized by planned housing and local markets.

tiles.name: dilshad_garden_industrial
tiles.description: An industrial area with factories and workshops located in East Delhi.

tiles.name: ghaziabad_border_area
tiles.description: The border area between Delhi and Ghaziabad, a city in Uttar Pradesh.

tiles.name: sahibabad_industrial_belt
tiles.description: An industrial belt in Ghaziabad, with various factories and manufacturing plants.

tiles.name: noida_sector_62_institutional
tiles.description: An institutional area in Noida, with universities, colleges, and IT parks.

tiles.name: mayur_vihar_residential
tiles.description: A residential area with apartment complexes and shopping centers.

tiles.name: vasundhara_enclave_upscale
tiles.description: An upscale residential enclave in East Delhi with gated communities and amenities.

tiles.name: akshardham_temple_complex
tiles.description: A sprawling Hindu temple complex with intricate carvings and exhibits.

tiles.name: sarai_kale_khan_bus_terminus
tiles.description: A major bus terminus connecting Delhi to destinations in Uttar Pradesh and other states.

tiles.name: okhla_industrial_area
tiles.description: An industrial area with factories and workshops, contributing to Delhi's manufacturing sector.

tiles.name: dwarka_expressway_construction
tiles.description: The under-construction Dwarka Expressway, aimed at easing traffic congestion between Delhi and Gurgaon.

tiles.name: gurgaon_cyber_city_it_hub
tiles.description: A major IT hub in Gurgaon, with offices of multinational corporations and technology companies.

tiles.name: manesar_industrial_model_town
tiles.description: A planned industrial model town in Haryana, with factories and residential areas.

tiles.name: rajiv_chowk_metro_station
tiles.description: One of the busiest metro stations in Delhi, connecting various lines of the Delhi Metro.

tiles.name: haryana_border_farmlands
tiles.description: Agricultural land bordering Delhi and Haryana, supplying fresh produce to the city.

tiles.name: dhaula_kuan_military_area
tiles.description: An area with military establishments and cantonment areas.

tiles.name: palam_airport_vicinity
tiles.description: The area around the old Palam Airport, now used for cargo and VIP flights.

tiles.name: vasant_kunj_residential
tiles.description: An affluent residential area in South Delhi with parks and shopping malls.

tiles.name: mehrauli_archaeological_park
tiles.description: An archaeological park with historical ruins and tombs dating back to different eras.

tiles.name: saket_district_center
tiles.description: A district center with shopping malls, multiplexes, and corporate offices.

tiles.name: munirka_student_accommodation
tiles.description: An area known for affordable accommodation for students studying at nearby universities.

tiles.name: sanjay_van_reserve_forest
tiles.description: A dense urban forest providing green space and a natural habitat within the city.

tiles.name: jnu_university_campus
tiles.description: The campus of Jawaharlal Nehru University, a renowned center for social sciences and humanities.

tiles.name: qutub_minar_historical_site
tiles.description: The area surrounding the Qutub Minar, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and historical landmark.

tiles.name: badarpur_border_crossing
tiles.description: A border crossing between Delhi and Haryana on the southern edge of the city.

tiles.name: faridabad_industrial_hub
tiles.description: A major industrial hub in Haryana, bordering Delhi, with factories and manufacturing units.

tiles.name: surajkund_lake_area
tiles.description: The area surrounding Surajkund Lake, known for its crafts mela and historical significance.

tiles.name: tughlaqabad_fort_ruins
tiles.description: The ruins of Tughlaqabad Fort, a massive stone fortress built by the Tughlaq dynasty.

tiles.name: greater_noida_expressway
tiles.description: A major expressway connecting Delhi to Greater Noida, facilitating faster travel.

tiles.name: dnd_flyway
tiles.description: The Delhi-Noida-Delhi Flyway, a toll road connecting Delhi and Noida across the Yamuna River.

tiles.name: outer_ring_road_north
tiles.description: The northern section of the Outer Ring Road, a major arterial road encircling Delhi.

tiles.name: mukherjee_nagar_coaching_center
tiles.description: An area known for its coaching centers preparing students for competitive exams.

tiles.name: rohini_residential_area
tiles.description: A large planned residential area in North Delhi with parks and markets.

tiles.name: pitampura_commercial_hub
tiles.description: A commercial hub with shopping malls, offices, and restaurants.

tiles.name: mangolpuri_resettlement_colony
tiles.description: A large resettlement colony created for relocated populations.

tiles.name: sultanpuri_industrial_belt
tiles.description: An industrial belt with small-scale factories and workshops.

tiles.name: nangloi_jat_rural_area
tiles.description: A semi-rural area on the outskirts of Delhi, with agricultural land and villages.

tiles.name: mundka_industrial_area
tiles.description: An industrial area with factories and warehouses.

tiles.name: bahadurgarh_border_town
tiles.description: A border town in Haryana, adjacent to Delhi, with industrial and residential areas.

tiles.name: najafgarh_drainage_basin
tiles.description: A low-lying area susceptible to flooding during the monsoon season.

tiles.name: outer_ring_road_south
tiles.description: The southern section of the Outer Ring Road, a major arterial road encircling Delhi.

tiles.name: south_delhi_greenbelt
tiles.description: A greenbelt area providing a buffer between urban development and natural landscapes.

tiles.name: chattarpur_farms_area
tiles.description: An area known for its farmhouses and green spaces, popular for weddings and events.

tiles.name: sultanpur_national_park
tiles.description: A national park known for its bird sanctuary and migratory bird populations (a bit further afield).

tiles.name: bijwasan_railway_station
tiles.description: A railway station connecting Delhi to other parts of the country.

tiles.name: palwal_agricultural_region
tiles.description: An agricultural region beyond Delhi, providing food supplies to the city.

tiles.name: gurgaon_faridabad_road
tiles.description: A road connecting Gurgaon and Faridabad, passing through industrial and residential areas.

tiles.name: sohna_hills_region
tiles.description: A hilly region near Gurgaon, known for its scenic beauty and hot springs (further from the city).

tiles.name: ghaziabad_upper_ganga_canal
tiles.description: A canal providing irrigation water to agricultural areas in Ghaziabad.

tiles.name: kundli_manesar_palwal_expressway
tiles.description: A major expressway connecting Kundli, Manesar, and Palwal, bypassing Delhi.
